CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Taking advantage of the temperature - dependent aggregation effect , BHJ PSCs with PffBB-n:PC71BM as an active blend layer spin - coated at different temperatures were fabricated and investigated which showed considerably various photovoltaic performance.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Let's identify the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph:

1. BHJ PSCs: This refers to "Bulk Heterojunction Photovoltaic Cells".
2. PffBB-n: This refers to "PffBB-n", which is a material with an unknown name.
3. PC71BM: This refers to "PC71BM", which is a material with the name "PC71BM".

So, the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph are:

* BHJ PSCs
* PffBB-n
* PC71BM
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Of course! Here are the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph:

1. PC71BM

So, the only "Material Name" entity in the paragraph is:

* PC71BM

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid "Material Name" entities in the paragraph as a Markdown table:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PC71BM |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Taking advantage of the temperature - dependent aggregation effect , BHJ PSCs with PffBB-n:PC71BM as an active blend layer spin - coated at different temperatures were fabricated and investigated which showed considerably various photovoltaic performance.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Property Name" entities in the given paragraph:

1. Temperature - dependent aggregation effect
2. BHJ PSCs (Bulk Heterojunction Photovoltaic Cells)
3. PffBB-n (Poly[9,9-dioctylfluorene-co-benzothieno[3,2-b]thieno[3,4-e][1,4]benzothiazine]-n)
4. PC71BM (Phenyl-C61-butyric acid methyl ester)

Let me explain each one:

1. Temperature - dependent aggregation effect: This is a property of the material, referring to the way in which the material's molecules behave and interact with each other when subjected to different temperatures.
2. BHJ PSCs: This is a type of photovoltaic cell, specifically a bulk heterojunction (BHJ) type.
3. PffBB-n: This is a specific material used in the active blend layer of the BHJ PSCs. It is a polymer consisting of a combination of 9,9-dioctylfluorene and benzothieno[3,2-b]thieno[3,4-e][1,4]benzothiazine.
4. PC71BM: This is another specific material used in the active blend layer of the BHJ PSCs. It is a phenyl-based molecule commonly used in organic photovoltaic cells.

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

Of course! Here are the entities that clearly refer to Material Property in the given paragraph:

1. PffBB-n
2. PC71BM

These are the only entities in the paragraph that are directly related to Material Property. The other entities (BHJ PSCs, temperature) are not directly related to Material Property and have been removed.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities related to Material Property in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Property Name":

| Property Name |
| --- |
| PffBB-n |
| PC71BM |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Taking advantage of the temperature - dependent aggregation effect , BHJ PSCs with PffBB-n:PC71BM as an active blend layer spin - coated at different temperatures were fabricated and investigated which showed considerably various photovoltaic performance.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Let's break down the paragraph and identify the entities related to "Property Value" one by one:

1. Temperature: This is a physical quantity that is mentioned in the paragraph as a factor that affects the photovoltaic performance of the BHJ PSCs. The temperature at which the BHJ PSCs are fabricated and investigated is mentioned as a variable that influences the performance of the devices.
2. Photovoltaic performance: This is a property of the BHJ PSCs that is being measured and evaluated in the paragraph. The performance of the devices is related to their ability to convert light into electrical energy, and it is affected by various factors, including the temperature at which they are fabricated and operated.
3. PffBB-n:PC71BM: This is a blend layer composed of two materials, PffBB-n and PC71BM, which are used in the fabrication of the BHJ PSCs. The performance of the devices is influenced by the properties of these materials, such as their optical and electronic properties, which can affect the overall efficiency of the devices.
4. Spin-coating: This is a method of depositing the active layer of the BHJ PSCs, which is mentioned in the paragraph as a factor that affects the performance of the devices. The spin-coating method can influence the uniformity and quality of the active layer, which can in turn affect the overall performance of the devices.
5. Active layer: This is the layer of the BHJ PSCs that is responsible for absorbing light and converting it into electrical energy. The properties of the active layer, such as its thickness, composition, and structure, can affect the performance of the devices.

In summary, the entities related to "Property Value" in the paragraph are:

* Temperature
* Photovoltaic performance
* PffBB-n:PC71BM
* Spin-coating
* Active layer
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Of course! Here are the entities that clearly refer to the value of material properties in the paragraph:

1. Photovoltaic performance: This is the property of the BHJ PSCs that is being measured and evaluated in the paragraph. The performance of the devices is related to their ability to convert light into electrical energy, and it is affected by various factors, including the temperature at which they are fabricated and operated.
2. PffBB-n:PC71BM: This is a blend layer composed of two materials, PffBB-n and PC71BM, which are used in the fabrication of the BHJ PSCs. The properties of these materials, such as their optical and electronic properties, can affect the overall efficiency of the devices.

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities related to the value of material properties in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column titled "Property Value":

| Property Value |
| --- |
| Photovoltaic performance |
| PffBB-n:PC71BM |
